Sure, here are some tips on how you can stay connected with your fellow alumni:

1. Join Alumni Associations: Most institutions have alumni associations that are a great way to stay connected with the alumni community. You can join these associations and get updates on upcoming events or connect with your fellow alumni.

2. Attend Events: Attend events hosted by your institution or alumni associations. This is an opportunity to meet and network with former classmates and learn about new developments in your industry.

3. Connect on Social Media: Join the alumni group and online community pages on social media platforms like LinkedIn or Facebook. This way, you can stay updated on alumni events and job openings in your industry.

4. Get Involved: Volunteer to help at events, participate in alumni-focused projects or mentor younger students. It's a great way to give back to your institution and stay connected with your peers.

5. Keep your Contact Information Up-to-date: Make sure to regularly update your contact information with your institution or alumni association. This makes it easier for you to stay connected and receive relevant information that is useful for your career growth.
